2556.verse: وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ|And We made them|149|157|8242$أَئِمَّةً|leaders,|72|88|11856$يَهْدُونَ|they guide|90|106|6928$بِأَمْرِنَا|by Our Command.|137|153|11857$وَأَوْحَيْنَآ|And We inspired|126|142|4642$إِلَيْهِمْ|to them|72|80|3030$فِعْلَ|(the) doing|94|100|11858$ٱلْخَيْرَٲتِ|(of) good deeds,|131|143|1329$وَإِقَامَ|and establishment|140|152|11859$ٱلصَّلَوٲةِ|(of) the prayer|119|131|4381$وَإِيتَآءَ|and giving|87|99|11860$ٱلزَّكَوٲةِ‌ۖ|(of) zakah;|94|100|11861$وَكَانُواْ|and they were|116|216|615$لَنَا|of Us|54|255|338$عَـٰبِدِينَ|worshippers.|103|204|11825$

2557.verse: وَلُوطًا|And (to) Lut|102|114|5798$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ|We gave him|105|130|6995$حُكْمًا|judgment|81|106|5035$وَعِلْمًا|and knowledge,|123|148|8901$وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ|and We saved him|141|166|11855$مِنَ|from|50|62|156$ٱلْقَرْيَةِ|the town|80|93|4197$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|87|232$كَانَت|was|71|97|888$تَّعْمَلُ|doing|70|96|11862$ٱلْخَبَـٰٓئِثَ‌ۗ|wicked deeds.|114|140|6917$إِنَّهُمْ|Indeed, they|105|131|106$كَانُواْ|were|69|82|94$قَوْمَ|a people|76|169|8321$سَوْءٍ|evil,|64|250|11863$فَـٰسِقِينَ|defiantly disobedient.|162|255|7658$

2558.verse: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُ|And We admitted him|161|170|11864$فِى|into|48|66|89$رَحْمَتِنَآ‌ۖ|Our Mercy.|93|111|11223$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, he|91|109|396$مِنَ|(was) of|76|94|156$ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ|the righteous.|117|126|1197$

2559.verse: وَنُوحًا|And Nuh,|80|87|2777$إِذْ|when|55|69|1198$نَادَىٰ|he called|79|93|11069$مِن قَبْلُ|before,|92|106|250$فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا|so We responded|134|148|11865$لَهُۥ|to him|61|75|977$فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ|and We saved him|141|148|8241$وَأَهْلَهُۥ|and his family|110|161|6579$مِنَ|from|50|152|156$ٱلْكَرْبِ|the affliction,|109|211|11866$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|[the] great.|99|150|996$

2561.verse: وَدَاوُۥدَ|And Dawud|94|105|11868$وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ|and Sulaiman,|112|133|4646$إِذْ|when|55|76|1198$يَحْكُمَانِ|they judged|99|120|11869$فِى|concerning|92|113|89$ٱلْحَرْثِ|the field,|90|111|6068$إِذْ|when|55|66|1198$نَفَشَتْ|pastured|78|97|11870$فِيهِ|in it|49|86|32$غَنَمُ|sheep|59|96|11871$ٱلْقَوْمِ|(of) a people,|111|148|2608$وَكُنَّا|and We were|107|144|6992$لِحُكْمِهِمْ|to their judgment|135|154|11872$شَـٰهِدِينَ|witness.|93|93|7466$

2562.verse: فَفَهَّمْنَـٰهَا|And We gave understanding of it|238|251|11873$سُلَيْمَـٰنَ‌ۚ|(to) Sulaiman,|114|140|949$وَكُلاًّ|and (to) each|112|138|4352$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|104|509$حُكْمًا|judgment|81|94|5035$وَعِلْمًا‌ۚ|and knowledge.|123|151|8901$وَسَخَّرْنَا|And We subjected|141|196|11874$مَعَ|with|48|103|443$دَاوُۥدَ|Dawud|78|133|4647$ٱلْجِبَالَ|the mountains|114|142|6550$يُسَبِّحْنَ|(to) glorify Our praises|170|203|11875$وَٱلطَّيْرَ‌ۚ|and the birds.|112|177|11876$وَكُنَّا|And We were|108|173|6992$فَـٰعِلِينَ|the Doers.|89|122|8839$

2563.verse: وَعَلَّمْنَـٰهُ|And We taught him|147|156|10901$صَنْعَةَ|(the) making|104|123|11877$لَبُوسٍ|(of) coats of armor|147|166|11878$لَّكُمْ|for you|67|86|207$لِتُحْصِنَكُم|to protect you|117|136|11879$مِّنۢ|from|50|59|53$بَأْسِكُمْ‌ۖ|your battle.|98|154|11880$فَهَلْ|Then will|78|189|6409$أَنتُمْ|you|54|165|796$شَـٰكِرُونَ|(be) grateful?|111|167|11881$

2564.verse: وَلِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ|And to Sulaiman,|132|138|11882$ٱلرِّيحَ|the wind|77|89|11883$عَاصِفَةً|forcefully|91|103|11884$تَجْرِى|blowing|81|93|242$بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ|by his command|126|138|1031$إِلَى|to|53|65|118$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land|92|98|100$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|72|232$بَـٰرَكْنَا|We blessed|95|116|6771$فِيهَا‌ۚ|[in it].|62|83|253$وَكُنَّا|And We are|97|118|6992$بِكُلِّ|of every|75|96|306$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|90|186$عَـٰلِمِينَ|Knowers.|89|100|11822$

2556.verse: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us.

2557.verse: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient.

2558.verse: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous.

2559.verse: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.

2560.verse: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together.

2561.verse: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement.

2562.verse: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that].

2563.verse: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful?

2564.verse: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing.
